DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this project is to investigate if addition of glutamine, an amino acid, to standard parenteral nutrition, may improve the clinical outcome of the bone marrrow transplantation reducing the occurrence of veno-occlusive disease and severity of mucositis.
DOC.brief_title: Effects on Glutamine on the Outcome of Allogeneic Bone Marrow Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Allogeneic bone marrow transplant recipients using busulfan and cyclophosphamide as conditioning.
